proc play(self: Marathon; onlyMatched = true) {.inline, ...raises: [ValueError],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Plays a marathon mode with the random mathced pairs. If onlyMatched is true, the pairs are chosen from the matched result; otherwise, chosen from all pairs.
